title: Bet you can't play the High Scores level in Keen4...
content:
For a little while now I've been wondering how you can play the high-score screen in Keen 4, and I've just figured out a way - so to make it a little more interesting...

Has anyone figured it out? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

(no doubt someone figured out how ages ago and will post in the next five minutes, thus making this completely unnecessary, but hey, you never know)

title: Re: Bet you can't play the High Scores level in Keen4...
content:
Hehe. *figured it out ages [well over a decade] ago* [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

title: Re: Bet you can't play the High Scores level in Keen4...
content:
If you mean going there by using level warp cheat, yeah, then I know! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] But if there's another way, tell me!3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

Even though I am an ordinary man.

title: Re: re
content: So I'm guessing nobody knows how to do this?  (Not sure what your method is Spleen, but if you were thinking of the warp cheat like KR, then no, that doesn't work for Keen4 - try it.)

title: Re: re
content:

Hmmm, no idea now.. Perhaps there's some bug in some level that transforms Keen there or something? No idea! This is interesting. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"

title: hum
content:
I always thought it was very interesting that the level-entering notice for Keen5's HighScores was "Keen's in the High Score screen! Call Id!" ...wonder what they had planned. Say Aardvark!

Either way, Malv--enlighten us!

title: Erm?
content:
Hmm... seems I don't know afterall then.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] Intriguing... do tell.

[edit]
Sarah asked me to post this:

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/keen4e_000.png[/img]

She didn't say anything else about it, so I don't know what method she used to get there.

title: Re: Erm?
content:
Hmm, Sarah's screenshot looks more convincing - but you really need one with all the enemies dead, otherwise it could just be a doctored shot of the demo (since the demo doesn't kill all the creatures.)

[img]http://www.shikadi.net/pckf/keen4_highscores.png[/img]

Any other guesses about how one might get access to this level, before I reveal the amazingly unexciting way I discovered?

Here's a hint - I had to edit that screenshot, as something is displayed on the screen which would give away the method used to get into the level.

title: Re: Erm?
content: Beat the game with a high score?

title: Re: Erm?
content:
a+2+enter, ctrl+w, warp to a specific level. The description will even say something like "Keen wanders around the high score board". [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Erm?
content:
Well I think we can safely say Sarah's figured it out ("Levelass"?! lol)

Okay, I'll spill the beans now. You can access it without modifying the game files, but I wouldn't say "pure playing" - just think, I wonder how they created that demo in the first place...?

title: pokemon mini
content:
Something to this effect? That was my next guess, but somehow I read 'no warp cheat' as 'no cheat'. Well that's unexciting.

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v192/Jimage/keenlike/ingame/k4-demomebeautiful-00.png[/img]
I crashed it... somehow.

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v192/Jimage/keenlike/ingame/k4-demomebeautiful-01.png[/img]
Squish!

title: Re: pokemon mini
content:
Yep that's it - sorry, not very exciting, but intriguing nonetheless. Sarah, was this the method you used?

It's interesting how the warp cheat will only let you go to level 18, but the 'record a demo' cheat will let you go all the way up to 21...I wonder why they chose that number?

Oh, and if you die while recording a demo the game will crash. Also DOSBox has a snapshot key so you don't get the window title in the way [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

All I need now is to figure out how you're supposed to play the demos back again...

title: Re: pokemon mini
content:
All I did was use the warp cheat and warp to level 19 (Warping to levels higher than this gives me a game crash and 'Map too tall!' error.)

Its a nice trick, I think ID was trying to trick us by saying there was only 18 levels, or maybe they had a real reason.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: pokemon mini
content:
Hey, wait a minute -- perhaps some versions of the game allow warping to other levels than 1-18? I tried to warp to 19 but nothing happens.

So, was the correct answer "by using demo cheat"? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: pokemon mini
content:
The only way is to use ModKeen2, which I [url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/keen/spleen/download.html]did[/url] a couple of years ago with Keen6. That 'mod' needs work, though... I can make a batch file to minimise the messing around it takes to get it running.

Basically you export everything, then run the game and record a demo which gets saved to something like demox.ck6, then import everything again and WHAM!!! you've got a new demo sequence!

Or something to that effect, anyway.

title: Re: pokemon mini
content:
So you actually cannot warp to level 19? But it works fine for me! I'll even make a video if I am doubted. [It will have to be very short.]
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: pokemon mini
content:
Nope, I tried it with Keen4 v1.0 and v1.4, and the warp prompt only offers you level 1-18, and if you type in any larger numbers they're ignored - hence the reason for the 'record a demo' cheat...what version of Keen4 are you using?

Edit: Also, what does it say on the screen when you warp to level 19? I tried running "keen4e tedlevel 19" to warp there as well but it just crashes, presumably because there's no "Keen enters the High Scores" message in my version of the EXE.
